summary: Comprehensive testing of Inventario FIFO module completed. All backend APIs (22/22 tests passed) and frontend pages working correctly. Fixed one bug in Salidas page (SelectItem empty value error).

ui_bugs.issue: SelectItem with empty string value causing runtime error - FIXED

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/inventario - List all inventory items
Backend: POST /api/inventario - Create new inventory item
Backend: GET /api/inventario/{id} - Get single item with FIFO lots
Backend: PUT /api/inventario/{id} - Update inventory item
Backend: DELETE /api/inventario/{id} - Delete inventory item
Backend: Duplicate codigo validation
Backend: GET /api/inventario-ingresos - List all entries
Backend: POST /api/inventario-ingresos - Create inventory entry
Backend: Stock updated after ingreso
Backend: Invalid item rejection for ingreso
Backend: GET /api/inventario-salidas - List all exits
Backend: POST /api/inventario-salidas - Create exit with FIFO cost calculation
Backend: Stock updated after salida
Backend: Insufficient stock rejection for salida
Backend: Salida linked to production registro
Backend: GET /api/inventario-ajustes - List all adjustments
Backend: POST /api/inventario-ajustes - Create entrada adjustment
Backend: POST /api/inventario-ajustes - Create salida adjustment
Backend: Insufficient stock rejection for ajuste salida
Backend: Invalid tipo rejection for ajuste
Backend: GET /api/stats - Includes inventory statistics
Frontend: Sidebar shows 'Inventario FIFO' section with submenus
Frontend: /inventario page loads with items table
Frontend: Create new inventory item dialog works
Frontend: /inventario/ingresos page loads with entries table
Frontend: Create new ingreso dialog works
Frontend: /inventario/salidas page loads with exits table
Frontend: Create new salida dialog works (after fix)
Frontend: FIFO cost displayed correctly (S/ 165.00 = 30 * 5.50)
Frontend: /inventario/ajustes page loads with adjustments table
Frontend: Create new ajuste dialog works
Frontend: Stock status badges (OK, Sin stock) display correctly
seed_data_creation: Test items created during backend testing were cleaned up. Existing TELA-001 item preserved with stock=70.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Inventario FIFO module fully tested. TELA-001 has stock=70 (100 ingreso - 30 salida). FIFO calculation verified: 30 units * S/5.50 = S/165.00. All CRUD operations for Items, Ingresos, Salidas, and Ajustes working. Fixed SelectItem empty value bug in Salidas page.

fix_applied.issue: SelectItem with empty string value causing 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string' error
fix_applied.fix: Changed value='' to value='none' and added conversion logic in onValueChange handler
